description.en: Strategic management is concerned with how a firm sets its direction, chooses its business activities, introduces the concepts and tools that will help you to analyse the firm and its enviornment and develop an understanding of how strategies are formed and managed.
description.et: Kursus käsitleb strateegilise juhtimise põhilisi valdkondi: ettevõtte eesmärkide ja tegevuse kavandamist, ettevõtte ja selle keskkonna strateegilise analüüsi meetodeid ning strateegiate kujundamist ja juhtimist.

objectives.en: The objective is to supply learners with the opportunity to gain basic knowledge on strategic management and methods/techniques for strategic analysis.
objectives.et: Eesmärgiks on luua võimalused organisatsiooni (ettevõtte) strateegilise juhtimise põhiteadmiste omandamiseks ning analüüsivõtete ja meetodite omandamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: A student who has successfully passed this course:
a) knows the main concepts of strategic management;
b) understands the theoretical and practical questions of strategic management, from the co-operational, employee and manager perspectives;
learning_outcomes.et: b) mõistab ettevõtte strateegilise juhtimise teoreetilisi ja praktilisi küsimusi, lähtudes erinevate ressursside ja juhtimisvaldkondade koostoimest nii töötaja kui juhi töö spetsiifikast lähtuvalt.

learning_outcomes.en: c) is able to analyze and evaluate the organization and its environment from strategic perspective;
learning_outcomes.et: c) oskab analüüsida ja hinnata organisatsiooni ja selle keskkonda strateegilisest vaatepunktist.

learning_outcomes.en: d) is able to apply main methods/tools of strategic analysis
learning_outcomes.et: d) oskab rakendada peamisi strateegilise analüüsi meetodeid/tööriistu.

learning_outcomes.en: e) has acquired skills and experiences for the analysis of holistic functioning of an organization;
learning_outcomes.et: e) on omandanud oskused ja kogemused analüüsida organisatsiooni kui terviku toimimist.

description.et:
Assessment methods and criteria: Each student can collect a maximum of 100 points: The passing points are a minimum of 60 points. Presenting Final assignement is mandatory. Points will be collected as follows: 

1.	Participation in lectures and seminars (4 points per lecture/seminar, max 20 points). 
2.	Assignment 1; Group-based homework of a selected case-study: Analysis of a Firm (max 20 points).
3.	Assignment 2; Group-based homework of a selected case-study: Analysis of an Industry and Competition (max 20  points).  
4. Final assignment; group-based homework: complete Strategy analysis of a selected case-study (max 40 points). 

.

grade_preconditions.et: Minimum 30 points must be collected from participations from lectures and seminars and Assignments 1 & 2.
